mil5.1.4:1.2_0: ‘aṭṭhime, bhikkhave, hetū aṭṭha paccayā mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāyā’ti.
mil5.1.4:1.3_3: natthañño navamo hetu mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāya.
mil5.1.4:1.4_2: añño navamo hetu bhaveyya mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāya,
mil5.1.4:1.5_2: natthañño navamo hetu mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāya,
mil5.1.4:1.5_4: ayañca navamo hetu dissati mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāya,
mil5.1.4:1.5_5: yaṁ vessantarena raññā mahādāne dīyamāne sattakkhattuṁ mahāpathavī kampitāti.
mil5.1.4:1.6_2: aṭṭheva hetū aṭṭha paccayā mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāya,
mil5.1.4:1.6_3: tena hi vessantarena raññā mahādāne dīyamāne sattakkhattuṁ mahāpathavī kampitāti yaṁ vacanaṁ,
mil5.1.4:1.7_0: Yadi vessantarena raññā mahādāne dīyamāne sattakkhattuṁ mahāpathavī kampitā,
mil5.1.4:1.7_1: tena hi aṭṭheva hetū aṭṭha paccayā mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāyāti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
mil5.1.4:1.8_0: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho sukhumo dunniveṭhiyo andhakaraṇo ceva gambhīro ca,
mil5.1.4:1.8_2: neso aññena ittarapaññena sakkā visajjetuṁ aññatra tavādisena buddhimatā”ti.
mil5.1.4:2.2_0: ‘aṭṭhime, bhikkhave, hetū aṭṭha paccayā mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāyā’ti.
mil5.1.4:2.3_0: Yaṁ vessantarena raññā mahādāne dīyamāne sattakkhattuṁ mahāpathavī kampitā,
mil5.1.4:2.3_1: tañca pana akālikaṁ kadācuppattikaṁ aṭṭhahi hetūhi vippamuttaṁ,
mil5.1.4:3.1_0: Yathā, mahārāja, loke tayoyeva meghā gaṇīyanti vassiko hemantiko pāvusakoti.
mil5.1.4:3.2_0: Yadi te muñcitvā añño megho pavassati,
mil5.1.4:3.2_1: na so megho gaṇīyati sammatehi meghehi,
mil5.1.4:3.3_1: vessantarena raññā mahādāne dīyamāne yaṁ sattakkhattuṁ mahāpathavī kampitā,
mil5.1.4:3.3_2: akālikaṁ etaṁ kadācuppattikaṁ aṭṭhahi hetūhi vippamuttaṁ,
mil5.1.4:4.1_1: himavantā pabbatā pañca nadisatāni sandanti, tesaṁ, mahārāja,
mil5.1.4:4.1_2: pañcannaṁ nadisatānaṁ daseva nadiyo nadigaṇanāya gaṇīyanti.
mil5.1.4:4.3_0: gaṅgā yamunā aciravatī sarabhū mahī sindhu sarassatī vetravatī vītaṁsā candabhāgāti,
mil5.1.4:4.6_1: vessantarena raññā mahādāne dīyamāne yaṁ sattakkhattuṁ mahāpathavī kampitā,
mil5.1.4:4.6_2: akālikaṁ etaṁ kadācuppattikaṁ aṭṭhahi hetūhi vippamuttaṁ,
mil5.1.4:5.1_1: rañño satampi dvisatampi tisatampi amaccā honti,
mil5.1.4:5.3_0: senāpati purohito akkhadasso bhaṇḍāgāriko chattaggāhako khaggaggāhako.
mil5.1.4:5.6_0: Yuttattā rājaguṇehi, avasesā agaṇitā, sabbe amaccātveva saṅkhaṁ gacchanti.
mil5.1.4:5.7_1: vessantarena raññā mahādāne dīyamāne yaṁ sattakkhattuṁ mahāpathavī kampitā,
mil5.1.4:5.7_2: akālikaṁ etaṁ kadācuppattikaṁ aṭṭhahi hetūhi vippamuttaṁ,
mil5.1.4:6.2_2: kitti ca yesaṁ abbhuggatā devamanussesu satta janāti”.
mil5.1.4:6.4_6: puṇṇā ca dāsīti ime satta diṭṭhadhammasukhavedanīyā sattā,
mil5.1.4:7.1_0: “Aparepi suyyanti nu kho atīte mānusakeneva sarīradehena tidasabhavanaṁ gatā”ti?
mil5.1.4:7.4_3: mandhātā ca rājāti ime caturo janā suyyanti,
mil5.1.4:7.6_1: atīte vā addhāne vattamāne vā addhāne itthannāmassa dāne dīyamāne sakiṁ vā dvikkhattuṁ vā tikkhattuṁ vā mahāpathavī kampitā”ti?
mil5.1.4:7.8_1: āgamo adhigamo pariyatti savanaṁ sikkhābalaṁ sussūsā paripucchā ācariyupāsanaṁ,
mil5.1.4:7.8_2: mayāpi na sutapubbaṁ ‘itthannāmassa dāne dīyamāne sakiṁ vā dvikkhattuṁ vā tikkhattuṁ vā mahāpathavī kampitā’ti
mil5.1.4:7.9_2: bhagavato ca sakyamuninoti dvinnaṁ buddhānaṁ antare gaṇanapathaṁ vītivattā vassakoṭiyo atikkantā,
mil5.1.4:7.9_3: tatthapi me savanaṁ natthi ‘itthannāmassa dāne dīyamāne sakiṁ vā dvikkhattuṁ vā tikkhattuṁ vā mahāpathavī kampitā’ti.
mil5.1.4:7.10_1: tāvatakena vīriyena tāvatakena parakkamena mahāpathavī kampati,
mil5.1.4:7.10_3: sabbasoceyyakiriyaguṇabhārabharitā dhāretuṁ na visahantī mahāpathavī calati kampati pavedhati.
mil5.1.4:8.1_0: Yathā, mahārāja, sakaṭassa atibhārabharitassa nābhiyo ca nemiyo ca phalanti akkho bhijjati;
mil5.1.4:8.2_1: sabbasoceyyakiriyaguṇabhārabharitā mahāpathavī dhāretuṁ na visahantī calati kampati pavedhati.
mil5.1.4:9.1_1: gaganaṁ anilajalavegasañchāditaṁ ussannajalabhārabharitaṁ ativātena phuṭitattā nadati ravati gaḷagaḷāyati;
mil5.1.4:9.2_1: mahāpathavī rañño vessantarassa dānabalavipulaussannabhārabharitā dhāretuṁ na visahantī calati kampati pavedhati.
mil5.1.4:9.3_9: atha kho dānavasena bahulaṁ pavattati ‘kinti anāgatā yācakā mama santike āgaccheyyuṁ,
mil5.1.4:9.3_10: āgatā ca yācakā yathākāmaṁ labhitvā attamanā bhaveyyun’ti satataṁ samitaṁ dānaṁ pati mānasaṁ ṭhapitaṁ hoti.
mil5.1.4:9.4_1: vessantarassa satataṁ samitaṁ dasasu ṭhānesu mānasaṁ ṭhapitaṁ hoti dame same khantiyaṁ saṁvare yame niyame akkodhe avihiṁsāyaṁ sacce soceyye.
mil5.1.4:9.5_5: sabbasattarakkhāya ussukkaṁ āpanno ‘kinti ime sattā samaggā assu arogā sadhanā dīghāyukā’ti bahulaṁyeva mānasaṁ pavattati.
mil5.1.4:9.6_1: vessantaro rājā taṁ dānaṁ na bhavasampattihetu deti,
mil5.1.4:9.6_12: atha kho sabbaññutañāṇahetu sabbaññutañāṇaratanassa kāraṇā evarūpe atulavipulānuttare dānavare adāsi,
mil5.1.4:9.6_13: sabbaññutaṁ patto ca imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi—
mil5.1.4:11.2_0: Tassa evaṁ dadamānassa dhammānugatassa dhammasīsakassa dānanissandabalava vīriyavipulavipphārena heṭṭhā
mil5.1.4:11.2_1: mahāvātā sañcalanti saṇikaṁ saṇikaṁ sakiṁ sakiṁ ākulākulā vāyanti onamanti unnamanti vinamanti,
mil5.1.4:11.2_8: tesu vātesu kupitesu udakaṁ saṇikaṁ saṇikaṁ calati,
mil5.1.4:11.2_24: khubhite luḷite jaladhāre pakampati mahāpathavī sanagā sasāgarā,
mil5.1.4:12.1_1: mahati mahāpariyoge uddhanagate udakasampuṇṇe ākiṇṇataṇḍule heṭṭhato aggi jalamāno paṭhamaṁ tāva pariyogaṁ santāpeti,
mil5.1.4:12.2_1: vessantaro rājā yaṁ loke duccajaṁ, taṁ caji,
mil5.1.4:12.2_2: tassa taṁ duccajaṁ cajantassa dānassa sabhāvanissandena heṭṭhā mahāvātā dhāretuṁ na visahantā parikuppiṁsu,
mil5.1.4:12.2_5: iti tadā mahāvātā ca udakañca mahāpathavī cāti ime tayo ekamanā viya ahesuṁ mahādānanissandena vipulabalavīriyena natthediso, mahārāja,
mil5.1.4:12.3_0: Yathā, mahārāja, mahiyā bahuvidhā maṇayo vijjanti.
mil5.1.4:12.5_0: indanīlo mahānīlo jotiraso veḷuriyo ummāpuppho sirīsapuppho manoharo sūriyakanto candakanto vajiro khajjopanako phussarāgo lohitaṅgo masāragalloti,
mil5.1.4:12.6_1: yaṁ kiñci mahiyā dānaṁ vijjati api asadisadānaṁ paramaṁ,
mil5.1.4:12.6_2: taṁ sabbaṁ atikkamma vessantarassa rañño mahādānaṁ aggamakkhāyati,
mil5.1.4:12.6_4: rañño mahādāne dīyamāne sattakkhattuṁ mahāpathavī kampitā”ti.
mil5.1.4:13.1_5: yaṁ tathāgato bodhisatto samāno asamo lokena evaṅkhanti evaṁcitto evaṁadhimutti evaṁadhippāyo,
mil5.1.4:13.1_10: cariyaṁ caratopi tāva tathāgatassa sadevake loke seṭṭhabhāvo anudassito.
